meanings.definition: A person who is sexually attracted to both men and women.
meanings.sent1: Some ambisexuals may find it challenging to navigate relationships with both genders.
meanings.sent2: Ambisexuals have the ability to form romantic connections with individuals of any gender.
meanings.sent3: At a party, ambisexuals have the advantage of potentially being attracted to anyone there.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of labels, ambisexuals are like free spirits, flowing between genders effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The term 'ambisexuals' paints a picture of individuals who embrace love without boundaries.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to individuals who are sexually attracted to both men and women.
meanings.sent1: The ambisexuals community is inclusive and welcoming of all sexual orientations.
meanings.sent2: Her ambisexuals nature allows her to appreciate beauty in all its forms.
meanings.sent3: The ambisexuals party was a colorful mix of diverse individuals celebrating love.
meanings.sent4: In a world of black and white, she saw the world in shades of ambisexuals gray.
meanings.sent5: The artist's work was described as ambisexuals, capturing the essence of fluid attraction.
